transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Agranjeet Namaskar.
Executive: Namaskar sir.
Customer: Aaj kya baat kar raha tha kaise hain?
Executive: Ha ha badhiya hu bas. Aapka hi phone ka wait kar raha tha mai.
Executive: Nahi nahi mai to aap bole the Sunday call karenge fir mai usi intezar me tha.
Customer: Actually us din mai Friday ko soya hua tha isliye se baat nahi ho payi thi.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Bhai ye log kya kiya in logo ne yaar aisa thodi hota hai yaar.
Executive: Nahi sir mai hat gaya us jagah se mai mera mai promote ho gaya tha and uske baad hua ki abhi aapka jo account manager hai wo Lakshman hai.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Unse koi dikkat nahi hoga sir.
Customer: Dikkat nahi hoga ye hai ki usko itna usko itna samajh hai matlab sab.
Executive: Ladka sahi hai janta hai sahi hai. Ladka sahi hai uski dikkat nahi hai ab maan lijiye ki kahi kuch kamiya reh jati hai ya koi cheez samajh me nahi aata hai use to un cheezon ke liye to mai to yahi hu sir uske liye aap tension free rahiye.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Wo to aap ek mujhe message bhi dal dijiyega ya call kar dijiyega to mai to yahi hu.
Customer: Thik hai koi baat nahi. But kya hai wo maine plan jabhi karwaya tha thik hai abhi renew karaya tabhi maine isliye specially pehle hi bola tha ke unko ye ji ko ke account manager mera change nahi hona chahiye unhone bola thik hai fir bhi change kar diya.
Executive: Mai to ab mai IndiaMART me abhi bhi hu lekin mai account manager nahi reh sakta kisi ka. Mai account manager.
Customer: Aap wo samajh gaya aapki post thodi aage ho gayi hai.
Executive: Ji. Isi liye aap tension free rahiye mai rahunga sir aisa nahi hai ki mai ispe nahi dekhunga company mere hi under hai abhi bhi but wahi hai ki kisi aur ladke me hai to iske liye aap chinta mat kijiye koi dikkat nahi aayega hoga sir.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Uske liye tension free rahiye aap kahi kuch problem hoga koi bhi doubt hogi to aap mujhe call kar lijiyega koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Thik hai chalo koi baat nahi sir.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Account manager was changed despite assurance.

- Expresses concern about new account manager's understanding.



Resolution:

- Executive assured the customer of continued support.

- Executive clarified his role change within IndiaMART.

- Executive assured no issues with new account manager.



Next Steps: 

- Customer can contact executive for any issues.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- account manager, support, reassurance, role change
